zenCSS Components

Box structure

Let's look at the way our containers, rows and columns work. We've simulated our "zen test" mode to help you visualize our each element.

this is a container

This is a nested row.

this is a nested column. Columns expand or contract automatically. 100% width by default.

this is a nested paragraph

A simple page layout might look something like this. Note: all col widths are dynamic based on how many siblings they have.

1 column. 100% width

1 column. 50% width, 100% width at mobile

1 column. 50% width, 100% width at mobile

1 column. 33% width, 50/100% width on tablet, 100% width on mobile

1 column. 33% width, 50/100% width on tablet, 100% width on mobile

1 column. 33% width, 50/100% width on tablet, 100% width on mobile
